name: WordCram ~READ DESCRIPTION~
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Your goal is to earn as many points as you can
by putting the scrambled letters into their correct order and make a word.
Start to move the letters into their correct placement.
You will have one minute and 30 seconds to try and
solve as many words you can.

SELECTING A LETTER:

To select a letter, press the number key corresponding to
the position of the letter.
For example pressing the 4 key will get you the forth letter in the word.
The dot under it will go white whenever it is selected,
to unselect a letter tap it again.

MOVING A LETTER:

A letter may be moved to any spot within the scrambled word.
Once you have selected a letter, press the button corresponding
to the position  of the letter you want to swap with it with.

If the letter is in the correct position
it will flash flash briefly black.
